charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Mela and
Armarouge relaxing together.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_0200:
Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Don’t just stare at me.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_0300:
It’s not like I’m doin’ anything weird. Just takin’ a
breather between training sessions.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_0400:
We aren’t just about gettin’ fired up. I try to make
time for stuff like this, too.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_0500: Flames also need time to quietly flicker.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_0600: And Armarouge here is a precious partner to me.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_0800: It’s not really worth goin’ on about.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_0900: But you seem itchin’ to know more, so all right.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1000: I’ve known my partner since he was a Charcadet.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1100:
Since before we kicked off Operation Star in
Paldea.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1200:
We blazed through tons of battles and just kept
turnin’ up the heat.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1300:
But the reason we could keep burnin’ without
losin’ heat or momentum...
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1400:
was we had other Team Star members battlin’
alongside us.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1600:
And then, when Charcadet got so hot he nearly
burnt out, he evolved into Armarouge.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1700: But he’s not the only one who evolved.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1800:
The Starmobiles—the Pokémon-powered vehicles
used in Operation Star—didn’t have enough juice,
so we needed some extra firepower.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_1900:
So I had other Charcadet evolve too, and we
pumped up the heat!
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_2000:
Looks like Armarouge wants to get back to
training soon.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_0401_2200: Nah, it’s not like I understand his words, but...
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_0302_2300: You can understand how he feels?
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_2500:
I can tell more or less what he’s thinkin’ just by
lookin’ at the way his flames move.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_2600: After all, we’ve known each other a long time.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_2700:
He probably doesn’t wanna lose to the other
Armarouge in Team Star.
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_2800:
We’re gonna head off to train. Wanna join?
Seems you’re all fired up now too!
charaepi_ch0320_00_meroko/2301_1201_2900: Come on—let’s have an explosive battle!
